#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int test,n,X,Y,i;
    cin>>test;
    while(test--)
    {
                 int sum=0;
                 cin>>n;
                 int x[n],y[n];
                 cin>>X>>Y;
                 for(i=0;i<n;i++)
                 cin>>x[i]>>y[i];
                 for(i=0;i<n;i++)
                 sum=sum+fabs(X-x[i])+fabs(Y-y[i]);
                 cout<<sum*2<<endl;
    }
   // system("pause");
    return 0;
}
